short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly switch between stock analysis pages on Screener.in and TradingView.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly switch between Screener.in and TradingView charts with one click

Enhance your stock analysis workflow with our Chrome extension, designed to provide quick and easy navigation between Screener.in and TradingView. Whether you're analyzing fundamental data on Screener.in or diving into technical charts on TradingView, our extension reduces the hassle of manually switching tabs or typing URLs. With a simple click, you can effortlessly toggle between the platforms for any stock symbol, saving time and streamlining your research process. Perfect for traders and investors seeking a more efficient way to access their favorite analysis tools.
